data.title: Boutique Classique....bringing sexy & classy styles back!
data.text: Boutique Classique is an adorable shop located in Vallejo CA that offers hand picked , high quality retro styles & specialty items very reasonable prices. Serenity is extremely attentive to her clients, and any potential customer who is curious about the shop and just wants to pop in and see what's going on ( there are LIVE WINDOW MODLES there often, showing off the clothing lines!!) If you are living in Vallejo, passing through or planning a vacation in the area and you enjoy fun, sexy & classy clothing... This is a MUST VISIT shop.
